src:
My Chemical Romance Tambah Jadwal Konser Termasuk di Asia
06 Nov 2019, 15:39 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


My Chemical Romance mengonfirmasi sejumlah jadwal konser terbaru menyusul reuni mereka yang telah lama dinantikan. (www.mychemicalromance.com)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- My Chemical RomanceÂ mengonfirmasi sejumlah jadwal konser terbaru menyusul reuni mereka yang telah lama dinantikan. Sejauh ini, band pencetak hit I Don't Love You itu mengumumkan setidaknya tiga pertunjukan tambahan pada 2020, termasuk di Asia.Pada akhir Oktober lalu, ikon musik emo ini mengumumkan reuni dan bakal tampil perdana sejak 2012. Konser pertama mereka akan diadakan di Shrine Expo Hall, Los Angeles pada 20 Desember mendatang.Kini, Gerard Way dan kawan-kawan menambah jadwal untuk tampil di Australia, Selandia Baru, dan Jepang.My Chemical Romance akan tampil dalam gelaran Download Festival Australia, yang diadakan di Sydney dan Melbourne pada 20-21 Maret 2020. Di acara tersebut mereka akan menjadi penampil utama bersama Deftones dan Jimmy Eat World.



Setelah itu, mereka akan lanjut tampil dalam acara The Outer Fields di Western Springs Stadium, Auckland pada 25 Maret 2020 bersama penampil spesial lainnya, Jimmy Eat World, Midnight Youth, dan Miss June. Dari Selandia Baru, MCR kemudian lanjut menjadi penampil utama di Download Japan pada 29 Maret 2020 bersama The Offspring, Evanescence dan lainnya.






Besarnya antusias penggemar yang terlihat dari penjualan tiket konser perdana MCR ludes dalam hitungan menit, band yang dibentuk pada 2001 ini pun menyampaikan ucapan terima kasih."Sungguh luar biasa bagi kami atas kebahagiaan yang telah kita alami selama dua hari terakhir. Dari lubuk hati kami, terima kasih atas sambutan hangatnya. Kami benar-benar tidak menduga hal ini. Sampai jumpa lagi. Xoxo, MCR," tulis mereka di Instagram.MCR sempat memutuskan rehat sejenak pada 2013. Sejak itu, kelima personel MCR tampak sibuk dengan kehidupan masing-masing. Vokalis Gerard Way sempat melepas album solo bertajuk Hesitant Alien pada 2014, sebelum 'tenggelam' dalam proyek komik The Umbrella Academy yang kemudian diangkat jadi serial di Netflix.Sementara gitaris Frank Lero yang juga memilih bersolo karier telah merilis album Barriers.Rumor soal mereka reuni sendiri telah bergema sejak tiga tahun silam, setelah akun media sosial band pemilik lagu Helena itu tiba-tiba aktif lagi. Saat itu, MCR merayakan satu dekade kelahiran album The Black Parade yang memang mengorbitkan Gerard Way dan kawan-kawannya ke puncak popularitas.Kemudian, musisi Joe Jonas sempat mengatakan bahwa ia mengetahui MCR sedang berlatih di studio di tempat yang sama dengan tempat latihan The Jonas Brothers. Kini, setelah reuni dikonfirmasi sendiri oleh My Chemical Romance, penggemar mulai berharap mereka akan kembali ke studio bersama dan menggelar tur lagi.(agn, daf/end)
text:
My Chemical Romance Adds Concert Schedules Included in Asia
Nov 6 2019, 15:39 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


My Chemical Romance confirmed a number of the latest concert schedules following their long-awaited reunion. (www.mychemicalromance.com)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - My Chemical Romance confirmed a number of the latest concert schedules following their long-awaited reunion. So far, the hit band I Don't Love You announced at least three additional shows in 2020, including in Asia. At the end of last October, the emo music icon announced a reunion and will premiere since 2012. Their first concert will be held at the Shrine Expo Hall, Los Angeles on the 20th of December. Today, Gerard Way and friends add to the schedule to perform in Australia, New Zealand, and Japan. My Chemical Romance will appear in the Download Australia Festival, held in Sydney and Melbourne on 20 -21 March 2020. At the event they will be the main performers with Deftones and Jimmy Eat World.



After that, they will continue to perform at The Outer Fields at Western Springs Stadium, Auckland on March 25, 2020 with other special performers, Jimmy Eat World, Midnight Youth, and Miss June. From New Zealand, the MCR then continued to be the main performer at Download Japan on March 29, 2020 with The Offspring, Evanescence and others.






The amount of enthusiastic fans that can be seen from the sale of the first concert tickets MCR sold out in a matter of minutes, the band formed in 2001 also expressed thanks. "It is extraordinary for us for the happiness we have experienced for the past two days. thank you for the warm welcome. We really did not expect this. See you later. Xoxo, MCR, "they wrote on Instagram.MCR had decided to take a short break in 2013. Since then, the five MCR personnel seemed busy with their lives. . Vocalist Gerard Way had released a solo album titled Hesitant Alien in 2014, before being "drowned" in the comic project The Umbrella Academy which was later made a series on Netflix. While guitarist Frank Lero who also chose solo career had released the album Barriers. The rumors about their own reunion has been echoing since three years ago, after the band's social media account owner of the song Helena was suddenly active again. At that time, the MCR celebrated a decade of the birth of the album The Black Parade which indeed orphaned Gerard Way and his friends to the peak of popularity. Then, musician Joe Jonas had said that he knew the MCR was practicing in the studio in the same place as the Jonas Brothers practice site . Now, after the reunion has been confirmed by My Chemical Romance, fans are starting to hope that they will return to the studio together and have another tour. (Agn, daf / end)
